mapper.select: select ti.id, ti.name, ti.title, ti.price, SUM(th.times) totleTimes from air.tb_item ti join air.tb_history th on ti.id = th.item_id join air.tb_subcategory ts on ti.subcategory_id = ts.id join air.tb_category tc ON ts.category_id = tc.id where tc.id = #{categoryId} group by ti.id order by totleTimes desc limit 1;
